about_the_game:
"Those who enter the mist will never leave and the only way out is death, and even then, they will be reborn to face the same fate again, forever trapped in a cycle of violence and despair."

Killmist Enclave offers a captivating blend of randomly generated items and battles with challenging combat that increases in difficulty as you progress. Earn coins, souls and loot with each encounter to enhance your equipment before your next battle. But beware: death lurks patiently.

Gameloop:

Engage in battles, plunder loot, acquire items, upgrade and refine, meet your demise, and rise again.

Features:

  • Randomized weapon and armor stats
  • Manipulate item quality to your advantage
  • Thrilling randomized battles
  • Formidable boss encounters
  • Embrace permanent death
  • Try your luck with Blackjack
  • Test your dexterity with Picklocking
  • Challenge yourself with Speedrun Modes
  • Unleash your potential with talents (Kept on death)
  • Collect enticing cosmetics (Kept on death)

Content:

Items: 8 Trinkets, 21 weapons(randomized), 9 armors(randomized), 28 consumables, 6 utilities
Enemies: 24 creatures, 6 bosses
Talents: 8 in total
Cosmetics: 26 skins, 8 outlines, 4 effects
Speedrun: 2 modes
Random Event: 2 events
Difficulty Modes: easy, normal, hard

Starting Tips:

  • Dropped items automatically teleport to the center when you return to town.
  • Easy mode is good to learn basics, difficulty can be changed at the Sword Stand.
  • Enemies get more accurate the closer you are.
  • Acquire equipment early on.
  • Refine your items stats in the forge to maximize their potential.
  • Your progress is automatically saved after each battle and upon quitting the game.

name: Killmist Enclave

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Killmist Enclave offers a captivating blend of randomly generated items and battles with challenging combat that increases in difficulty as you progress. Earn coins, souls and loot with each encounter to enhance your equipment before your next battle. But beware: death lurks patiently.
